Restaurant Automation Integration
Integrate advanced restaurant automation features into Our ERP system.

Restaurant Automation for ERP is a specialized Chrome extension designed to enhance the ERP system with advanced restaurant management capabilities. This tool is exclusively developed for our company, which comprises approximately 800 personnel, to automate and streamline various tasks within our restaurant operations.

**NOTE**
If you are not one of our coworkers do not install it, it won't work for you.
